quote: Most of my life has been spent keeping information close, turning it over and over in my mind. The impulse to share anything is a new one, the impulse to hide as natural as breathing.
quote_letters: MOST OF MY LIFE HAS BEEN SPENT KEEPING INFORMATION CLOSE TURNING IT OVER AND OVER IN MY MIND THE IMPULSE TO SHARE ANYTHING IS A NEW ONE THE IMPULSE TO HIDE AS NATURAL AS BREATHING
